title: Star Wars Power of the Jedi Death Star Droid, with Mouse Droid
description: hard to find death star droid figure

Ever loyal to their masters in the Empire, Death Star droids are forever on the lookout for any treacherous or suspicious activity. This foot-tall replica offers a realistic appearance of its movie counterpart, right down to its radio antenna and bulging, fly-like eyes. The droid is made of a tough gray plastic and is fully posable, articulated at the neck, shoulders, hips, knees, and ankles. Included is a small mouse droid that rolls about on a set of wheels.
